map.name: Hide n' Seek
map.objective: Find all the hiders before the 7 minutes are up!

rules.rule: Name tags of hiders are not visible
More houses disappear in the earlier stages
As the match progresses, new stages occur faster and faster

destroyables.name: house
destroyables.materials: cobblestone;mossy cobblestone;wood;log;fence;carpet;ladder;thin glass;cobblestone stairs;wood plate;dirt;wood stairs;smooth brick;wooden door;step;spruce fence;double step

destroyables.name: last houses
destroyables.materials: cobblestone;mossy cobblestone;wood;log;fence;carpet;ladder;thin glass;cobblestone stairs;wood plate;dirt;wood stairs;smooth brick;wooden door;step;spruce fence;double step

broadcasts.alert: Your name tag won't be displayed to the Seekers, no need to shift!
Every minute, some of the buildings will disappear!
